cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Oversight and Reform on June 29, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 1204, District of Columbia Chief Financial Officer Salary Home Rule Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 33 (Monday, February 22, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. NORTON:
H.R. 1204.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
clause 17 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution.
[Page H549]

latestAction.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 95.

title: District of Columbia Chief Financial Officer Salary Home Rule Act
